page.title: 07ADVENTUROUS HOBBIES
page.content: More adventurous characters spend their time skiing on snow and water, working on archaelogical digs, caring for peacocks and budgies, playing tennis, squash or badminton for which they have to leave the area. A few hobbies fall into the 1% category, namely sailing, fishing, photography, cycling, wine-making, carpentery and cigarette card collecting. It is not surprising that the watersports are not a favourite: the only expanses of water in the area are not publicly available. The main reason for the variety of hobbies is the difference in ages and backrounds. The more elderly inhabitants participate in indoor hobbies, the younger in outdoor hobbies.
